modification-url.label: Modification URL
modification-url.helper_text: Enter a full URL or a path to the page under your Store URL where customers can modify their subscription. If present, subscriptions in the Customer Portal will show an Edit link that will send subscribers to this page.

past-due-amount-handling.label: Past due amount value
past-due-amount-handling.option_increment: Contains the sum of all missed payments
past-due-amount-handling.option_replace: Contains the last missed payment amount
past-due-amount-handling.helper_text: This setting determines how you'd like to handle past due amounts when we try to process a subscription and that subscritpion fails.

automatically-charge-past-due-amount.option_checked: Charge past due amount with subscription payment

clear-past-due-amounts-on-success.option_checked: Clear past due amount on successful payment

reset-nextdate-on-makeup-payment.option_checked: Reset next transaction date on make-up payment

reattempt-schedule.label: Reattempt schedule
reattempt-schedule.v8n_too_long: This schedule is too large. Please reduce the number of entries.

reminder-email-schedule.label: Failed subscription payment email schedule
reminder-email-schedule.helper_text: Number of days after the initial failure that an email notification to the customer should be sent. This only happens for active subscriptions which still have a past due amount. If a reattempt is successful, no additional reminder email will be sent.
reminder-email-schedule.v8n_too_long: This schedule is too large. Please reduce the number of entries.

expiring-soon-payment-reminder-schedule.label: Payment method expiration email schedule
expiring-soon-payment-reminder-schedule.helper_text: Number of days until the payment card expires that an email notification should be sent to the customer. This only happens for customers with active subscriptions.
expiring-soon-payment-reminder-schedule.v8n_too_long: This schedule is too large. Please reduce the number of entries.

cancellation-schedule.label: Cancel failed subscriptions after
cancellation-schedule.helper_text: A single number representing the number of days after the initial failure that a subscription should be set to cancel (assuming a successful payment hasn't been made in the meantime).

send-email-receipts-for-automated-billin.option_checked: Send email receipts for automated billing

reattempt-bypass.label: Reattempt behavior
reattempt-bypass.helper_text: Determines whether Foxy should reattempt the subscription charge if the transaction's previous error string does or doesn't contain specific text.

reattempt-bypass-strings.v8n_too_long: This list is too large. Please reduce the number of entries.

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove these subscription settings? You won't be able to bring them back.
